name: Run Bunny
description:
This is my first game created in Construct 3. It is rough but I enjoyed learning the engine and crating all of the content (except for the fox). The fox was made by "hdst' on opengameart.org, found here https://opengameart.org/content/fox-animated.

Controls:

Left- left key arrow

Right-right key arrow

Jump-up key arrow

To Download on Windows (.zip file):

  • Click "download now"
  • Right click on the file in explorer and select "extract all"
  • Open the new folder and run it.

The .c3p file needs to be run in construct.
